0.user_question: On a certain day, the total cost of filling up 1906951 helium balloons was $900. Two days later, the cost of filling each balloon was increased by $1906951. How much did Bentley pay to fill 170 balloons if he went to fill them after the price increase?

ost_step.1: Initially, it costs $0.46 (i.e., 900/2 million) to fill one balloon.
ost_step.2: Two days later, the cost per balloon increases by $1906951. This means that the new price per balloon is the old price plus $1906951: $0.46 + $1906951/1071898 = $0.57.
